name: Ridesharing arrangement; defined
text: [§279G-1]  Ridesharing arrangement; defined.  As used in this chapter, "ridesharing arrangement" means the transportation of persons in a motor vehicle where that transportation is incidental to another purpose of the driver.  The term includes ridesharing arrangements known as carpools, vanpools, and buspools. [L 1982, c 166, pt of §1]
